summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6233 for the improvement of West 136th Place from 1st Ave. Northwest to 3rd Ave. Northwest; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 89414, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
